message:
Internal error: Argument 1 passed to PHPStan\Analyser\Scope::getType() must be an instance of PhpParser\Node\Expr, null given, called in /Users/luoxiaojun/php/phpstan/src/Rules/Arrays/AppendedArrayItemToStringRule.php on line 40
Run PHPStan with --debug option and post the stack trace to:
https://github.com/phpstan/phpstan/issues/new
